wikipedia_page.main: Peter Simpson Dennitts Kerr (20 June 1891 – 24 April 1969) was a Scottish football player and manager, who played for three Edinburgh clubs in a 21-year senior career: Hibernian (fifteen years), Heart of Midlothian (five years) and Leith Athletic (one year as a player followed by seven as manager). He also played once for Scotland.
